name: VR Cave Climbing
description:
This game perhaps only works on Oculus Rift S and has no audio.

By the way when climbing only one hand is grabbing hold and the other hand looses grip!

Controls for Oculus Rift S

Grip buttons on both controllers for climbing

Left controller thumbstick for moving

Right controller thumbstick for turning around

Solo project

Noel Söyrinki
